title: Episode #18: Dan Byman on Al Qaeda and Its Affiliates
itunes:title: Episode #18: Dan Byman on Al Qaeda and Its Affiliates
itunes:subtitle: Brookings and Georgetown scholar Daniel Byman talks about his new paper, "Breaking the Bonds Between Al-Qa'ida and Its Afiliate Organizations."
description:
Brookings and Georgetown scholar Daniel Byman talks about his new paper, "Breaking the Bonds Between Al-Qa'ida and Its Afiliate Organizations."
